{"name": "Tall Shadow 1/20", "description": "Tall Shadow
2022
Hand-drawn animation, NFT, unique drawing
00:00:05 loop

As the sun rises and falls, a little figure smiles at the sight of his exaggerated outline. Tall shadow recalls the youthful joy found in playing with our shadow. An extension of ourselves, the shadow is both our first and final friend in life.

b�b�Each edition comes with one of twenty hand drawn frames that comprise the original animation. This is a physical drawing 14 x 10cm signed, numbered and dated.
